ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Industry of RICK PERKINS of Ingramport, Nova Scotia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
